      • saveJSGF

        public void saveJSGF(URL url)
              throws URISyntaxException,
                     IOException
        This JSGFRule grammar will be saved to the file in the provided URL, Overwriting any contents in the provided file, or creating a new one if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to save this JSGFRuleGrammar to.
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException - If there was a problem converting the given url to uri.
        IOException - if an error occurs while saving or compiling the grammar
